title: Millennial Love podcast – latest updates: Every season two episode so far
text:
Millennial Love is The Independent lifestyle desk’s dating and relationships podcast.

Hosted by Olivia Petter, the podcast features in-depth discussions surrounding sexuality, identity and gender.

Topics discussed in the second season include how to have feminist sex and dating in a post-#MeToo era.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Stay updated with all things Millennial Love here or over on Instagram @Indy.Lifestyle.

Key Points The Independent lifestyle desk's podcast relaunches with a new look and celebrity lineup

Hosted by Olivia Petter, Millennial Love will explore everything from how to have feminist sex to dating in a post-#MeToo era

Activist and writer Munroe Bergdorf says gender reveal parties could be 'dangerous' for trans children in first episode

First episode of season two features Munroe Bergdorf (Luke Nugent) Writer and activist Munroe Bergdorf has been unveiled as the first guest for season two of Millennial Love. In the episode, Bergdorf opens up about her experiences of coming out as transgender aged 23 and explains why the concept of gender reveal parties is so problematic. Listen to the episode here Millennial Love returns The Independent lifestyle desk's dating and relationships podcast has a sparkling new logo for season two Millennial Love is back for a second season today. The Independent lifestyle desk's dating and relationships podcast will drop every Friday for the next 10 weeks. Each episode will revolve around a central theme, ranging from having feminist sex to navigating the dating scene in a post #MeToo era. Other topics to be explored in the season include overcoming grief in relationships, coming out as LGBT+ and getting over a break up.
